TopicTitle: So I was trying to launch a boat from a plane....

Articles.Content:
I was building a plane that was carrying a boat, STOCK GAME, and then, right as I thought I was about to get the plane able to fly, the game crashed.

Mega rage.

Hopefully it saved...

Here's a screenshot of the plane in early development...

Just to give you an idea of what I was working with...
OH POOP! Dat big! Classic super big so game crashes.
If you haven't saved the craft manually (I'm in the habit of doing so every time I launch), the game will save the last launched craft as 'Auto-Saved Ship'. You should be able to recover it that way!
Alright, quick update: with more struts the game stopped crashing. But eventually, there was so much mass it was impossible to make enough lift. Project abandoned for now.

Alright, quick update: with more struts the game stopped crashing. But eventually, there was so much mass it was impossible to make enough lift. Project abandoned for now.

The struts are holding the game together! The magic of the strut is real!!!
